com.psa.rxlightstreamer.core

Class RxLightStreamerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psa.rxlightstreamer.core.RxLightStreamerClient

  • public class RxLightStreamerClient
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents a LightStreamer client. The client has the option to connect or disconnect from the service. Status updates and errors are sent via the available observer.

    The class will also allow the user to subscribe to adapters.

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
                    java.lang.String adapterSet,
                    java.lang.String user,
                    java.lang.String password)

        Establish a connection with LightStreamer.

        Parameters:
        host - is the URL of the host to connect to.
        adapterSet - is the adapter set name that is to be used.
        user - is the username to use
        password - is the password to use.
